title: Refocus
subtitle: Reset your focus and get back on track

breath.name: The Breath
breath.action: Take 5 slow, deep breaths (4s in, 4s out)

dump.name: The Dump
dump.action: Write everything in your head on paper

one.name: The One
one.action: Circle the ONE thing that matters most right now

reset.name: The Reset
reset.action: Stand up and do 10 shoulder rolls

theWalk.name: The Walk
theWalk.action: Take a 2-minute walk around your space

anchor.name: The Anchor
anchor.action: Put your phone in another room

tiny.name: The Tiny
tiny.action: Do ONLY the first 2 minutes of the task

split.name: The Split
split.action: Break the task into 3 tiny pieces

hydrate.name: The Hydrate
hydrate.action: Drink a full glass of water slowly

gaze.name: The Gaze
gaze.action: Look out a window for 30 seconds

mentalStates.title: How are you feeling right now?
mentalStates.subtitle: Select your current mental state to receive a personalized protocol
mentalStates.restlessDesc: Can't sit still, need to move
mentalStates.avoidingDesc: Know what to do, but not doing it

flowState.title: Flow State Radar
flowState.basedOn: Based on {{completed}} of {{total}} resets completed successfully.
flowState.completionStats: Based on {{completed}} of {{total}} resets completed successfully.
flowState.suggestion: You often feel {{state}}. Consider techniques to prevent this.

selection.heading: How are you feeling right now?
selection.subtitle: Select your current mental state to receive a personalized protocol

protocol.title: Adaptive Mental Reset Protocol
protocol.theBreathAction: Take 5 slow, deep breaths (4s in, 4s out)
protocol.theDumpAction: Write everything in your head on paper
protocol.theOneAction: Circle the ONE thing that matters most right now

customProtocols.title: Custom Protocols
customProtocols.actionPlaceholder: e.g., Stand up and stretch for 30 seconds

feedback.question: Did this protocol help you?
feedback.thanksMessage: Thanks! We'll use this to personalize your experience.

completion.title: Protocol Complete
completion.message: You've completed all reset steps. Ready to focus?
